main.name: Alvaro Reyes Figueroa
main.description: Software Developer with 6+ years of experience building customer-focused technology solutions for banking and corporate sectors. Skilled in hybrid mobile app development, microservices, and ETL projects.
main.bio: Software Developer with 6+ years of experience building customer-focused technology solutions for banking and corporate sectors. Skilled in React Native, Node.js, Java, and Python. Expertise in microservices, ETL projects, AWS, and Oracle Cloud. Recognized for delivering high-quality, scalable solutions and continuously adopting new technologies. Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Certified.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to collaborate with you!

work.title: Senior Software Developer
work.description: Participated in the complete migration of Mi Pago to Mi Banco app, improving performance and user experience. Technologies: React Native, Jenkins, Java, BFF. Santiago, Chile (Hybrid).

work.title: Full-Stack Developer
work.description: Built microservices with Node.js and Express to enhance transactional flows (balances, account statements, credits). Optimized queries using MongoDB and Redis caching. Developed AWS Lambda serverless functions and managed APIs via AWS API Gateway. Deployed ETL pipelines with Python, PostgreSQL, Docker; integrated data from SQL, CSV, and REST APIs, applying data cleaning and normalization with Pandas and NumPy. Santiago, Chile.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Developed React Native mobile app for high-voltage tower inspections using Android PDA devices. Built Android inventory management app for Merk, with SQLite DB and SOAP API integration. Santiago, Chile.

certifications.name: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2024 Certified Foundations Associate
